remarks: There exist at least two different atoms under a co-atom.  This allows us to create a line under the co-atom.  TODO: is this needed? (Contributed by NM, 1-Jun-2012.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
lhp2at.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
lhp2at.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
lhp2at.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
lhpex2leN $p |- ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) -> E. p e. A E. q e. A ( p .<_ W /\ q .<_ W /\ p =/= q ) ) $.
$d .<_ p q $.
$d A p q $.
$d H p q $.
$d K p q $.
$d W p q $.
